V.iii.8.A.2.d
.
Disfigurement Due to Benign or Malignant Neoplasms
Do not evaluate disfigurement due to benign or malignant neoplasms of the gynecological system analogous to
38 CFR 4.118, DC 7800
.  DC 7800 is for evaluation of disfigurement of the head, face, or neck only.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 8, Section A - Disabilities of the Gynecological System
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 8, Section A
